name: Darkest Arena
description:
Darkest Arena is a FPS for blind and non blind people where you have to survive in a small room with the only help of a radar and a gun. 

Controls:

Left-Right Arrow to rotate over your self

Up Arrow to go forward

Space to shot

Left control to use radar and discover walls and enemies.

This game was done by Rising Pixel (Luca Contato and Laura del Pino). A previous version was presented to the audiogame jam 3
